name: Title Generation Prompt
description: Generates descriptive titles for content, tasks, or projects

ai_signature.name: title_generator
ai_signature.instruction: Generate a clear, descriptive title that accurately represents the content and is appropriate for the intended audience.

template_content:
Generate a descriptive title for the following content:

[CONTENT]

Please provide:
1. Primary title (clear and descriptive)
2. Alternative titles (2-3 options)
3. Brief rationale for the chosen title

Make the title concise but informative.
